Niko spotter sight
Niko's here to help!

Sight works with all tanks.

HOW TO INSTALL:

1. Install the sight

2. Go to the War Thunder folder and click "User Sights"

3. Make a file and name it "all_tanks"

4. Copy and paste the sight in the "all_tanks" folder

5. Boot up War Thunder and go into "Sight Settings" (options < ground vehicle battle settings)

6. Now you have Niko help you spot tanks, maybe even help you with your tunnel vision!

IF I SAW YOU GOONING TO THIS, I'M GONNA SEND A T9...

Source: Lori (Blue Archive)

Open 4 Sights Commissions, If you want to Request a Commission Reach out to knuttersmen on Discord

This is a SFW Sight! [Safe-For-Work]

Installation Guide

1) Unzip The Sight Zip File into your main Sights folder.

[Location should be \WarThunder\UserSights\all_tanks]

2) Note that after You install a sight you need to Reboot/Restart the game

3) Go to test drive and go in sight settings in OPTIONS (find the sight and save it)

4) Once in test drive, press F9 to update sights (it might refresh automatically aswell)

file.name: Tung Tung Tung Sahur WT sight.zip

list.description:
Прицел в стиле Тосака Рин из аниме "Судьба/Ночь схватки" (Fate/Stay Night). Лаконичный дизайн с элементами, вдохновлёнными её образом: длинные волосы с чёрными бантами и крестик на шее. Идеально для фанатов аниме и Fate-серии!


#TosakaRin #FateStayNight #Animepicel #Wtlive #Destiny #FateSeries #AnimeDesign
